column1:
(Sings) Is this what it's like
											to be alive?
									,"

column12: (Chant) Est-ce ça l'effet que ça fait

column1:
I reached the point of no return
									,"

column12: Alcancé el punto de no retorno
J'ai atteint le point de non-retour

column1:
and I don't know if I've been burned
									,"

column12: y no sé si he estado ardiendo
et je crois que mon âme se consume

column1:
from the burned bridges in my life,
											thinkin' you were wrong
											and I was right.
									,"

column12: por los puentes quemados de mi vida,
avec les ponts de ma vie

column1:
either way it's too late for us.
									,"

column12: ama zaten bizim için çok geçti.

column1:
wishin' I could hold you and just forget.
									,"

column12: deseando poder abrazarte y solo olvidar.
je rêve de te serrer dans mes bras

column1:
Since I can't I'll just be
home but homesick,
									,"
à la maison, avec le mal de toi,

wishin' you were mine
and I didn't hurt you like I did.
									,"
y no haberte herido como lo hice.

column12: souhaitant que tu sois à moi

column1:
Can't go back to when we had a chance,
									,"

column12: No puedo volver a cuando tuvimos
Pas de retour dans le passé,

column1:
wishin' I could have a shot
at real romance.
									,"

Now I realize all the things
I could have had were in your cold hands.
									,"

column12: Me doy cuenta de que todas las cosas

column1: que pudimos tener están en tus manos frías

I'm a fool for a dead romance.
									,"

column12: Fui engañada por un romance muerto.
Cet amour perdu me fait perdre la tête.

column1:
Is this what it's like to fantasize
									,"

about a love that never was alive
outside my mind or distance?
									,"

column12: con un amor que nunca estuvo vivo

column1: más allá de mi mente y la distancia?

column12: sur un amour qui n'a jamais existé

column1: en dehors de mon esprit, à distance ?

With time I clearly lost my sight,
									,"

column12: Con el tiempo perdí el norte,
Le temps m'a fait perdre toute notion,

column1:
thinkin' I was wrong
to ever leave your side.
									,"

column12: Pero el tiempo es el juez más severo,
Mais le temps est le juge le plus cruel,

column1:
makes us think we were in love.
									,"

column12: nos hace creer que estábamos enamorados.
il nous fait croire que l'on s'aimait.
